translation: Among the letters of the alphabet, I am the letter 'A' and the dual among compounds. I am verily the inexhaustible and everlasting time; I am the dispenser of the fruits of actions, having faces in all directions.
commentary: 10.33 of letters among letters? Akarah the letter A? I am (I) am? Duality the dual? of the compound among all compounds? f and? I'm I? Eve verily? Akshaya the inexhaustible or everlasting? Time: time? Dhata the dispenser? I'm I? Visvatomukaá¸¥ the Allfaced (or having faces in all directions).Commentary Among the alphabets I am the letter A. Among the various kinds of compounds used in Sanskrit language I
